result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon J. Tonnon

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Brandon J. Tonnon
Current: 916 1/2 S 3rd Ave, Wausau, WI 54401 United States  (Effective: 09-20-2017)
Prior: 713 N. 7th Street, Wausau, WI 54403 United States

Case called: 9:10 am
Includes 13CF182, 14CM1348, 14CM1897, 15CF603, 15CM741, 15CM867.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence:
Defendant appears in person and with Atty Austin Mort;

PRELIMINARY HEARING in 13CF182:
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information filed.  Reading Waived.


PLEA HEARING IN 15CF603, 15CM741, 15CM867:
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
15CF603:
Ct. 2 (BJ-Repeater)>>DRI.

15CM867:
Ct. 1 (Theft-Movable Property-Repeater)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 
15CF603:
Ct. 1 (Sex Registry Violation-Repeater)>> NO CONTEST.

15CM741:
Ct. 1 (Possession of THC-Repeater)>> NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
15CF603:
Ct. 1 (Sex Registry Violation-Repeater)>> 1 year MCJ, concurrent to all counts. Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. COURT finds 119 days credit. 

15CM741:
Ct. 1 (Possession of THC-Repeater)>> 1 year MCJ, concurrent to all counts. Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. COURT finds 119 days credit.

SENTENCING HEARING ON REVOCATION:
COURT ORDERS:
13CF182:
Ct. 1 (Escape-Criminal Arrest)>> 3 1/2 Years WSPS- 18 months IC and 2 years ES, concurrent to all counts. CONDITIONS: Counseling as recommended, Maintain Full time work/Full time school. Eligible for CIP and ERP programming. Any Financial obligations to be paid while on ES. COURT finds 423 days credit. No objection to ES being served in Brown County.

14CM1348:
Ct. 1 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia-Repeater)>> 6 months MCJ, concurrent to all counts. Court Costs and if cannot be added to ES, all Outstanding costs to be converted into a civil judgment. COURT finds 126 days credit.

14CM1897:
Ct. 1 (Battery-Repeater)>> 1 year MCJ, concurrent to all counts. Court Costs and if cannot be added to ES, all Outstanding costs to be converted into a civil judgment. COURT finds 155 days credit. 

Ct. 4 (DC-Repeater)>> 1 year MCJ, concurrent to all counts. Court Costs and if cannot be added to ES, all Outstanding costs to be converted into a civil judgment. COURT finds 155 days credit.

Adj: 9:33 am

Court ordered a $5,000.00 cash bond on 7-9-15
Original warrant returned from Sheriff's Dept.

Includes 15CM741, 15CM867 and 15CF603.    No contact with victim(s):  D.P.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Absolute sobriety.  No controlled substances without valid prescription and only in the amount prescribed.  Comply with sex registration requirements in 15CF603.
